globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data: blob: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' data:; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; font-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self';
